name: First Corp
overview: First Corporation, an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties. It primarily explores for precious and base metals. The company owns a 100% interest in the FirstCorp claims that consists of 2 mineral claims units, each comprising 1,280 acres, located in the Red Lake mining District, in the Province of Ontario, Canada. First Corporation was founded in 1995 and is based in Calgary, Canada.
